      • applyFixPermissions

        public static void applyFixPermissions(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log,
                                       File dir,
                                       List<FixPermission> fixPermissions)
                                throws IOException
        Applies the patterns to fix file permissions.
        Parameters:
        log - for logging output
        dir - the directory to process
        fixPermissions - the permissions to apply
        Throws:
        IOException - if application of permissions fails

      • copy

        public static boolean copy(org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log log,
                           File sourceLocation,
                           File targetLocation,
                           Pattern include,
                           FileCopy fileCopy)
                    throws IOException
        Copies or moves files and directories (recursively). If targetLocation does not exist, it will be created.

        Original code from Java-Tips.org.
        Parameters:
        log - for logging
        sourceLocation - the source file/dir
        targetLocation - the target file/dir
        include - the regular expression pattern for including files/dirs
        fileCopy - performs the actual copying of source/target file
        Returns:
        false if failed to delete when moving or failed to create target directory
        Throws:
        IOException - if copying/moving fails
